abstract: LPGA commissioner Mike Whan approves 16-year-old Lexi Thompson's petition for full membership begining in 2012, making her the tour's youngest member.
snippet: The L.P.G.A. commissioner, Mike Whan, approved Lexi Thompson’s petition for full membership beginning in 2012.
lead_paragraph: The L.P.G.A. commissioner, Mike Whan, approved Lexi Thompson’s petition for full membership beginning in 2012.

headline.seo: Lexi Thompson, 16, Becomes Youngest L.P.G.A. Member
